00010 #include <boost/thread.hpp>
00011 
00012 #include "message.h"
00013 
00014 namespace VTD
00015 {
00019 class MessageCallback
00020 {
00021 public:
00025     MessageCallback ();
00026 
00030     virtual ~MessageCallback ();
00031     // callback functions
00032     typedef boost::function<void(const ReceiveSCP*)> FuncSCP;
00033     typedef boost::function<void(const ConnectionEvent*)> ConnEven;
00034     typedef boost::function<void(const ReceiveRDB*, const ConnectionHandle&)> FuncRDB;
00035 
00044     template <class ReceiverT, class EventT>
00045     void registerEventFunc(ReceiverT*, void (ReceiverT::*memberFunc)(const EventT*), const ConnectionHandle& handle);
00046 
00055     template <class ReceiverT, class EventT>
00056     void deregisterEventFunc(ReceiverT*, void (ReceiverT::*memberFunc)(const EventT*), const ConnectionHandle& handle);
00057 
00061     void update();
00062 
00068     void updateRDBdeque(const std::vector<char>& bufferRDBData, const ConnectionHandle& handle);
00069 
00076     void updateSCPdeque(const std::vector<char>& bufferSCPData, const boost::array<char, SCP_HEADER_SIZE>& bufferSCPHdr, const ConnectionHandle& handle);
00077 
00084     void setDirectMode(bool active = true) { directModeActive_ = active; }
00085 
00086 public:
00087     // callback scp functions
00088     std::vector<MessageHandler> callbackScp_;
00089     // one com handler can have more callbacks so we have to use multi map
00090     std::multimap<ConnectionHandle, MessageHandler> handleRDBMessages_;
00091     // connection event
00092     ConnEven connEvent_;
00093 protected:
00094     bool directModeActive_;
00095     // deques with scp and rdb data
00096     RDBdeque rdbDeque_;
00097     SCPdeque scpDeque_;
00098     // mutexes
00099     boost::mutex mutex1_, mutex2_;
00100 
00101 private:
00102     // call callback and deliver data to outside
00103     void updateSCP();
00104     void updateRDB();
00105 };
00106 
00107 template <class ReceiverT, class EventT>
00108 void MessageCallback::registerEventFunc(ReceiverT* receiver, void (ReceiverT::*memberFunc)(const EventT*), const ConnectionHandle& connectionHandle)
00109 {
00110     MessageHandler messageHandle;
00111 
00112     if (EventT::MsgId == MESSAGE_RDB)
00113     {
00114         messageHandle.setHandler<EventT>(boost::bind(memberFunc, receiver, boost::placeholders::_1));
00115         handleRDBMessages_.insert(std::make_pair(connectionHandle, messageHandle));
00116     }
00117 
00118     if (EventT::MsgId == MESSAGE_SCP)
00119     {
00120         messageHandle.setHandler<EventT>(boost::bind(memberFunc, receiver, boost::placeholders::_1));
00121         callbackScp_.push_back(messageHandle);
00122     }
00123 
00124     if (EventT::MsgId == MESSAGE_CONNECTION_EVENT)
00125     {
00126         messageHandle.setHandler<EventT>(boost::bind(memberFunc, receiver, boost::placeholders::_1));
00127         connEvent_ = messageHandle;
00128     }
00129 }
00130 
00131 template <class ReceiverT, class EventT>
00132 void MessageCallback::deregisterEventFunc(ReceiverT* receiver, void (ReceiverT::*memberFunc)(const EventT*), const ConnectionHandle& handle)
00133 {
00134     if (!receiver || !memberFunc) return;
00135 
00136     if (EventT::MsgId == MESSAGE_RDB)
00137         handleRDBMessages_.find(handle)->second.unsetHandler<EventT>();
00138 
00139      if (EventT::MsgId == MESSAGE_SCP)
00140          callbackScp_.back().unsetHandler<EventT>();
00141 }
00142 
00143 }
